article.title: Rockwell Collins Provides Electronic Protection Radio Equipment
article.text: ?Rockwell Collins Inc., Government Systems, Cedar Rapids, Iowa, is being awarded a $141,019,568 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract (N00019-15-D-5501) to exercise an option for the procurement of the AN/ARC-210 family of electronic protection radio equipment for domestic and foreign military sales aircraft. Work will be performed in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, and is expected to be completed in September 2018. Contract funds will not be obligated at the time of award. Funds will be obligated on individual orders as they are issued. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
